title: book_Life_on_Planet_Rock
text:
ISBN-13: 9780767922081.
ISBN-10: 0767922085.
Title: Life on Planet Rock.
Subtitle: From Guns N' Roses to Nirvana, a Backstage Journey Through Rock's Most Debauched Decade.
Authors: Lonn Friend.
Categories: Biography & Autobiography.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=hqHJmAEACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: A music journalist chronicles the heyday of heavy metal and grunge rock music, furnishing portraits of such artists as Kurt Cobain, Gene Simmons, Alice Cooper, and Elvis Costello and capturing some of the watershed moments of the musical era..
Published Year: 2006.
Average Rating: 3.58.
Number of Pages: 320.
Ratings Count: 238.
